title.rendered: Karnataka vs Saurashtra, Indian First-Class Trophy, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Karnataka: Ravikumar Samarth, Mayank Agarwal (c), Devdutt Padikkal, Nikin Jose, Manish Pandey, Muralidhara Venkatesh, Sharath BR (wk), Krishnappa Gowtham, Shreyas Gopal, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Vidhwath Kaverappa

Saurashtra: Harvik Desai (wk), Snell Patel, Chirag Jani, Sheldon Jackson, Arpit Vasavada (c), Prerak Mankad, Parth Bhut, Chetan Sakariya, Vishvaraj Jadeja, Dharmendrasinh Jadeja, Yuvrajsinh Dodiya

Venue: M.Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 407

2nd innings average score: 217

3rd innings average score: 171

4th innings average score: 128

Wickets per innings: 9

Type: Gets tougher to bat as the game progresses

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Ravikumar Samarth has enjoyed batting in Bangalore. In only 4 games, he has accumulated 451 runs at a staggering average of 90, including 2 centuries and 2 fifties.

Mayank Agarwal has added 346 runs at 58 including the highest score of 117 in 4 games at Chinnaswamy this season. He is also the leading run-getter (686 at 69) for Bangalore.

But for his 161* and 3 for 26 in the last game at Bangalore, Shreyas Gopal experienced an ordinary time at his home ground in his first three outings: 35 runs and 3 wickets.

Vijaykumar Vyshak has taken 17 wickets at Chinnaswamy this season including the best figures of 5 for 59. He is also the highest wicket-taker (31) for his team.

Arpit Vasavada is the leading run-getter for Saurashtra. In 12 innings, he has hammered 577 runs at 58, including 2 centuries and as many half-centuries.

For Saurashtra, Dharmendrasinh Jadeja has taken the most wickets (37) in this edition.

Sheldon Jackson averages only 27 in his last 5 games but has been helping fantasy players through his catching. He has 10 to his credit for the season.

4 hundreds and 10 fifties have been slammed in the last 3 games at the venue.
